assetVin.description: The vehicle identification number (VIN) of the asset.

assetId.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier (alphanumeric) for the asset.

driverId.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier (alphanumeric) for the driver.

driverName.description: Name of the driver of the vehicle.

driverGroupId.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier (alphanumeric) for the group the driver has been assigned to.

driverGroupName.description: Name of the group the driver has been assigned

eventType.description: Category for the most recent tracking event status of the vehicle. Can be one of the following: ● driving ○ Any tracking event sent when the vehicle is driving ● idling ○ An iding tracking event was received. ● stopped ○ Any tracking event indicating the vehicle has stopped. ● ping ○ A tracking event sent at set intervals. For example received from an OBU attached to a trailer. ● input ○ Any tracking event indicating a change in an input attached to the OBU. ● unknown ○ A non-activity ping is received, which is sent from an electric vehicle to indicate if it’s charging or not. ● defect ○ Vehicle fault information read from the CANBUs has been received.

speed.description: The current speed of the vehicle (in kph). Not included if optional input parameter hideSpeedIfSpeedSensitive was set to true.

odometer.description: Odometer (in km) for the latest tracking event that has been received.

heading.description: Compass heading of the vehicle in degrees clockwise from north.

city.description: The name of the city where the asset is.

postCode.description: The postcode where the asset is.

country.description: The name of the country where the asset is.

formattedAddress.description: Country specific formatted address as a comma separated values using roadNumber, road, city, postcode and country. For example, UK addresses formatted as: roadNumber, road, city, postcode, country French addresses formatted as: roadNumber, road, postcode, city, country

division.description: The region / county / State from the address. For example: Normandy, Worcestershire, Tuscany, Arizona,

locationName.description: Name of a POI location if the vehicle is within the geo-fence boundary of a POI location.

locationGroupName.description: The name of the location category assigned to this POI location.

locationId.description: The identifier (alphanumeric) for the POI location.

privacy.description: Boolean (true / false) to indicate if the journey is a private journey.

energyType.description: The energy type for the vehicle. Can be one of the following: ● UNDEFINED ● EV - Battery Electric Vehicle ● PHEV - Plug-in Hybrid Electric Vehicle ● HEV - Hybrid Electric Vehicle ● FECV - Fuel Cell Electric Vehicle (Hydrogen) ● ICE - Internal combustion engine ● CNG - Compressed Natural Gas ● LNG - Liquefied natural gas ● LPG - Liquefied petroleum gas ● BI-FUEL - multi-fuel engines capable of running on two fuels.

fuelType.description: A list of the primary and secondary fuel types for the vehicle.  Values in the list can included: ● PETROL ● DIESEL ● PROPANE ● METHANE ● ELECTRIC ● HYDROGEN

electricBatteryLevelPercent.description: The electric vehicle battery level as a percentage.

electricBatteryLevelPercentEstimated.description: Boolean (true/false) if the electric vehicle battery level was estimated - true if estimated, fal

engineTotalHours.description: Engine hours for the latest tracking event that has been received (format is decimal hours)

engineTotalHoursType.description: Either ESTIMATED or CAN. ● CAN indicates the engineTotalHours value has been read from the vehicle’s CANbus, ● ESTIMATED indicates the engineTotalHours value has been calculated from the total vehicle journey times.

serialNumber.description: The serial number of the tracking device on the vehicle that sent this tracking event

batteryVoltage.description: Charge level of the battery powering the OBU

externalPowerVoltage.description: Charge level of an external power source supplying energy.

activeFaultCodes.description: Comma separated list of active fault codes on the vehicle.

id.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier (alphanumeric) of the group.

parentId.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier (alphanumeric) for the parent of this group. Not included for the root group in the hierarchy.

path.description: List of the unique, unchangeable system generated identifiers (alphanumeric) for all the parent groups (starting from the root node) of this group, separated by full stops. The list includes the identifier for this group.

vehicleIds.description: Array of unique, unchangeable system generated identifiers (alphanumeric) for the vehicles assigned to this group. Wil be an empty array for a newly created group.

personIds.description: Array of unique, unchangeable system generated identifiers (alphanumeric) for the drivers and web users assigned to this group. Wil be an empty array for a newly created group.

countDrivers.description: Count of the number of drivers in this group node.

countVehicles.description: Count of the number of vehicles in this group node.

countSecondaryDrivers.description: Count of assigned secondary drivers to group

countSecondaryVehicles.description: Count of assigned secondary vehicles to group

name.description: The name for the group - name must not contain any of the characters <>?"/|\%{}*[]

parentId.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier (alphanumeric) for the parent of this group. this value is mandatory, a new top root node for the hierarchy cannot be created.

id.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier (alphanumeric) of the location.

categoryId.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier (alphanumeric) for the location category.

categoryName.description: The name of the location category.

polygon.description: Array of points that define the geo-fence boundary of the polygon. Only included if the location has a type of POLYGON.

type.description: Specifies if the geo-fence boundary for this location has been defined as a circle or a polygon; can be POLYGON or CIRCULAR.

reference.description: A reference for this location. Included in the response if a reference has been specified for this location.

phoneNumber.description: A phone number for this location. Included in the response if a phone number has been specified for this location.

contact.description: A contact for this location. Included in the response if a contact has been specified for this location.

email.description: An email address for this location. Included in the response if an email address has been specified for this location.

notes.description: The notes for this location. Included in the response if notes have been specified for this location.

categoryName.description: Name of an existing location category.

radius.description: Radius (in km) of the location boundary. Must be between 0.001 and 1. Must be specified if polygon details are not specified.

polygon.description: Array of points that define the geo-fence boundary of the polygon. Must be specified if radius is not specified.

email.description: A valid email address for this location. Cannot be more than 50 characters.

notes.description: Notes for this location, Cannot be more than 140 characters.

longitude.description: Longitude value for the central point of the location.

latitude.description: Latitude value for the central point of the location.

id.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier (alphanumeric) for the location category.

name.description: The name of the location category.

icon.description: The icon assigned to the location category.

locationsCount.description: The number of locations with this location category.

groupId.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier (alphanumeric) of the group assigned to the vehicle.

groupName.description: Name of the group assigned to the vehicle.

odometerValue.description: Odometer (in km) at the end of the last journey.

tags.description: Comma separated list of tags for the vehicle. Not returned if there are no tags for this vehicle.

defaultDriverId.description: Default driver identifier (alphanumeric) for this vehicle. Not returned if there is no default driver for this vehicle.

status.description: Status of the vehicle. Can be one of the following: ● IN_CIRCULATION = Vehicle is active ● IN_MAINTENANCE = Vehicle is off the road for maintenance ● SOLD = Vehicle has been sold

fuelType.description: A list of the primary and secondary fuel types for the vehicle. Values in the list can include: ● PETROL ● DIESEL ● PROPANE ● METHANE ● ELECTRIC ● HYDROGEN

engineTotalHours.description: Engine hours for the latest tracking event that has been received (format is decimal hours)

engineTotalHoursType.description: Either ESTIMATED or CAN. ● CAN indicates the engineTotalHours value has been read from the vehicle's CANbus, ● ESTIMATED indicates the engineTotalHours value has been calculated from the total vehicle journey times.

serialNumber.description: The serial number of the tracking device on the vehicle that sends tracking events

activeFaultCodes.description: Comma separated list of active fault codes on the vehicle.

name.description: The friendly name for the vehicle. If a value is specified then ● Cannot contain any one of these characters: <>?*"

groupId.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier (alphanumeric) of an existing group to be assigned to this vehicle.

type.description: The vehicle type. Can be one of the following: ● AMBULANCE ● BICYCLE ● BOAT ● BUS ● BUS_DOUBLE_DECK ● CAR ● CAR_ESTATE ● CAR_SPORTS ● CARAVAN ● CARRIAGE ● COACH ● CONTAINER_ASSET ● DIGGER ● DIGGER_2 ● GRITTER ● HGV ● HORSEBOX ● MAN ● MINIBUS ● MIXER ● MOTORCYCLE ● MOTORHOME ● PDA111 ● RIGID ● SMARTPHONE_PDA ● SWEEPER_LARGE ● SWEEPER_SMALL ● TIPPER ● TIPPER_2 ● TRACTOR ● TRACTOR_TRAILER ● TRAILER ● TRAIN ● VAN ● VAN_BOX ● VAN_SMALL ● WASTE_VEHICLE ● CHERRY_PICKER_HGV ● CHERRY_PICKER_LCV ● VAN_LCV ● POOL_CAR ● HEAVY_VAN_HGV ● TIPPER_MEDIUM

tags.description: Comma separated list of tags. If specified

status.description: Status of the vehicle (optional). Will remain as its current value on the asset if not present in the update document. Can be one of the following: ● IN_CIRCULATION ● IN_MAINTENANCE ● SOLD

assetCosts.description: Costs associated with the vehicle. ● If specified replaces all existing asset costs. ● An empty assetCosts document will remove all costs.

monthlyInsuranceCost.description: Monthly insurance cost. Numeric with decimals.

monthlyMaintenanceCost.description: Monthly maintenance cost. Numeric with decimals.

scheduledMaintenanceAmount.description: Amount spent on scheduled maintenance. Numeric with decimals.

unscheduledMaintenanceAmount.description: Amount spent on unscheduled maintenance. Numeric with decimals.

costPerMileOverLimit.description: Cost per mile over agreed limit. Numeric with decimals.

costOfDisposal.description: Cost of disposal. Numeric with decimals.

buyoutAmount.description: Buy out amount. Numeric with decimals.

distance.description: Distance to the vehicle in kilometers

id.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier (alphanumeric) for the vehicle.

groupName.description: Name of the group assigned to the vehicle.

groupId.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier of the group assigned to the vehicle.

serviceDueDate.description: The service due date, in UTC, in format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss

assetName.description: The friendly name of the vehicle.

driverId.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier (alphanumeric) for the default driver for this vehicle.

id.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier (alphanumeric) for the vehicle.

groupName.description: Name of the group assigned to the vehicle.

groupId.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier (alphanumeric) of the group assigned to the vehicle.

assetName.description: The friendly name of the vehicle.

driverId.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier (alphanumeric) for the default driver for this vehicle.

faults.description: Array of faults for this vehicle.

code.description: A fault code, depending on the fault type.

startDate.description: Start date of the fault, in UTC, in format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss

endDate.description: End date of the fault, in UTC, in format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss

type.description: Fault type. Can be one of: CAN_FAULT - CANBus fault, DTC_LAMP - OBDII LAMP fault, DTC_FAULT - OBDII fault, J1939_FAULT - A SAE J1939 fault, J1939_LAMP - A SAE J1939 lamp.

inProgress.description: Whether the fault is currently in progress

occurrenceCount.description: Number of occurrences of this fault

fmiDescription.description: Description of the Failure Mode Identifier

totalPages.description: Total number of pages based on the page size

vehicleId.description: Identifier (alphanumeric) of the vehicle to which this fuel transaction was matched.

cardProvider.description: The name of the fuel card provider.

cardAccountNo.description: The account number for the fuel card set by the Fuel Card Provider.

transactionTimeStamp.description: Date and time of the transaction occurred, in UTC, in format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss

transactionId.description: Identifier (alphanumeric) for the fuel card transaction generated by the Fuel Card Provider.

fleetCode.description: The fleetcode set by the Fuel Card Provider.

accountName.description: The name of the account in Connect.

siteId.description: Identifier for the Fuel Station as set by the Fuel Card Provider.

cardNo.description: The fuel card number. Only the first four and last four digits of the card number will be shown.

driverName.description: Name of the driver as registered by the Fuel card provider.

quantityLitres.description: Quantity (in litres) of the fuel purchased. For non-fuel transactions is the number of non-fuel items purchased.

odometerKm.description: The odometer reading as recorded at the fuel station.

accountVRN.description: The vehicle registration number linked with the fuel card.

enteredVRN.description: The vehicle registration number entered at the fuel station.

transactionType.description: Type of transaction, fuel or non-fuel

productDescription.description: What was purchased (Diesel, Premium Diesel etc.)

hasTranTime.description: True or False to indicate if this transaction has a date/time value.

siteType.description: Site Type the Fuel Station as set by the Fuel Card Provider.

siteName.description: Site name for the Fuel Station as set by the Fuel Card Provider.

manuallyUpdated.description: True or False to indicate if this transaction has been manually linked to a vehicle.

startDate.description: Start date for the journey search period in UTC format (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss). Must be within the last 31 days and cannot be in the future. Time component is optional and defaults to 00:00:00 if not specified.

endDate.description: End date for the journey search period in UTC format (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss). Cannot be before start date and maximum range is 31 days. Time component is optional and defaults to 23:59:59 if not specified.

vehicleIds.description: Array of vehicle identifiers to retrieve journey details for. Maximum of 50 asset-days can be processed at once (e.g., 50 vehicles for 1 day or 25 vehicles for 2 days). Required for journey detail requests.

groupIds.description: Array of vehicle group identifiers. When specified, all vehicles within these groups will be included in the journey detail search, subject to the 50 asset-day limit.

startDate.description: Journey start date and time in UTC format (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss). Indicates when the business travel journey began. Time is provided in UTC timezone for consistent temporal tracking across different geographical locations.

endDate.description: Journey end date and time in UTC format (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss). Indicates when the business travel journey concluded. Time is provided in UTC timezone for consistent temporal tracking across different geographical locations.

vehicleId.description: Unique identifier for the vehicle used in the journey. References the specific vehicle asset involved in the business travel. Used for vehicle-specific journey tracking and reporting.

vehicleRegistration.description: Vehicle registration number or license plate identifier. Provides human-readable vehicle identification for business travel documentation and compliance reporting. Commonly used for expense and tax reporting.

vehicleName.description: Human-readable name or description of the vehicle. Provides additional context for vehicle identification in business travel reports. May include vehicle type, model, or fleet designation for easier recognition.

vehicleGroupId.description: Unique identifier for the vehicle group or fleet segment. Used for organizational hierarchy and reporting structure within business travel management. Enables grouping of vehicles by department, location, or function.

vehicleGroupName.description: Human-readable name of the vehicle group or fleet segment. Provides descriptive context for vehicle organizational structure in business travel reporting. Used for hierarchical reporting and cost center allocation.

driverId.description: Unique identifier for the driver associated with the journey. References the specific person who operated the vehicle during business travel. Essential for driver-specific expense tracking and compliance reporting.

driverName.description: Full name of the driver who conducted the journey. Provides human-readable identification for business travel documentation and expense reporting. Used in compliance and audit trail requirements.

driverGroupId.description: Unique identifier for the driver group or organizational unit. Used for driver organizational hierarchy and reporting structure within business travel management. Enables grouping by department or function.

driverGroupName.description: Human-readable name of the driver group or organizational unit. Provides descriptive context for driver organizational structure in business travel reporting. Used for hierarchical reporting and cost allocation.

durationSeconds.description: Total journey duration measured in seconds. Calculated as the time difference between journey start and end times. Used for time-based reporting and efficiency analysis in business travel tracking.

distanceKms.description: Total distance traveled during the journey measured in kilometers. Calculated based on GPS tracking or odometer readings. Essential for mileage reimbursement calculations and expense reporting in business travel management.

startAddress.description: Human-readable address or location description where the journey started. Provides context for journey origin in business travel documentation. Used for expense reporting and location-based analysis of travel patterns.

endAddress.description: Human-readable address or location description where the journey ended. Provides context for journey destination in business travel documentation. Used for expense reporting and location-based analysis of travel patterns.

startCoordinate.description: GPS coordinate location where the journey started. Contains latitude and longitude information for precise journey origin tracking. Used for accurate distance calculations and location-based business travel analysis.

endCoordinate.description: GPS coordinate location where the journey ended. Contains latitude and longitude information for precise journey destination tracking. Used for accurate distance calculations and location-based business travel analysis.

classification.description: Journey classification indicating the business purpose or type. Typical values include 'Business', 'Private', 'Journey Between Sites'. Essential for tax reporting and expense categorization in business travel management.

notes.description: Additional notes or comments about the journey. Provides context, purpose details, or special circumstances related to the business travel. Used for documentation and audit trail purposes.

startOdometer.description: Vehicle odometer reading at the start of the journey. Measured in kilometers and used for accurate distance tracking and vehicle maintenance scheduling. Essential for mileage-based expense calculations.

endOdometer.description: Vehicle odometer reading at the end of the journey. Measured in kilometers and used for accurate distance tracking and vehicle maintenance scheduling. Essential for mileage-based expense calculations.

startDate.description: Start date for the summary period in UTC format (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss). Time component is optional and defaults to 00:00:00 if not specified. Used to define the beginning of the journey summary calculation period.

endDate.description: End date for the summary period in UTC format (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss). Cannot be before start date. Time component is optional and defaults to 23:59:59 if not specified. Used to define the end of the journey summary calculation period.

groupIds.description: Array of vehicle group identifiers to include in the summary. When specified, only vehicles within these groups will be included in the journey summary calculations. Used for filtering summary results by organizational structure.

pageSize.description: Number of vehicle summary records to return per page. Must be a positive integer. Used for pagination to manage large result sets. If not specified, a default page size will be applied.

pageIndex.description: Zero-based page index for pagination. Must be zero or positive integer. Used to navigate through multiple pages of vehicle summary results. First page has index 0.

startDate.description: Start date for the summary period in UTC format (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss). Time component is optional and defaults to 00:00:00 if not specified. Used to define the beginning of the driver journey summary calculation period.

endDate.description: End date for the summary period in UTC format (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss). Cannot be before start date. Time component is optional and defaults to 23:59:59 if not specified. Used to define the end of the driver journey summary calculation period.

groupIds.description: Array of driver group identifiers to include in the summary. When specified, only drivers within these groups will be included in the journey summary calculations. Used for filtering summary results by organizational structure.

pageSize.description: Number of driver summary records to return per page. Must be a positive integer. Used for pagination to manage large result sets. If not specified, a default page size will be applied.

pageIndex.description: Zero-based page index for pagination. Must be zero or positive integer. Used to navigate through multiple pages of driver summary results. First page has index 0.

summaryList.description: Array of journey summary results containing aggregated data for vehicles or drivers. Each item represents summary information for a specific vehicle or driver including journey classification totals and distance metrics.

pagination.description: Pagination information for the summary results including total count, page size, and current page index. Used for navigating through large result sets in business travel summary reports.

vehicleId.description: Unique identifier for the vehicle in vehicle-based summary reports. References the specific vehicle asset for which journey summary data is provided. Used for vehicle-specific expense reporting and tracking.

vehicleRegistration.description: Vehicle registration number or license plate identifier in vehicle summaries. Provides human-readable vehicle identification for business travel summary documentation and compliance reporting.

vehicleName.description: Human-readable name or description of the vehicle in vehicle summaries. Provides additional context for vehicle identification in business travel summary reports.

vehicleGroupId.description: Unique identifier for the vehicle group or fleet segment in vehicle summaries. Used for organizational hierarchy and reporting structure within business travel summary management.

vehicleGroupName.description: Human-readable name of the vehicle group or fleet segment in vehicle summaries. Provides descriptive context for vehicle organizational structure in business travel summary reporting.

driverId.description: Unique identifier for the driver in driver-based summary reports. References the specific person for whom journey summary data is provided. Used for driver-specific expense reporting and tracking.

driverName.description: Full name of the driver in driver summaries. Provides human-readable identification for business travel summary documentation and expense reporting.

driverGroupId.description: Unique identifier for the driver group or organizational unit in driver summaries. Used for driver organizational hierarchy and reporting structure within business travel summary management.

driverGroupName.description: Human-readable name of the driver group or organizational unit in driver summaries. Provides descriptive context for driver organizational structure in business travel summary reporting.

businessKms.description: Total distance in kilometers for journeys classified as 'Business' during the summary period. Used for business expense calculations and tax reporting for legitimate business travel distances.

privateKms.description: Total distance in kilometers for journeys classified as 'Private' during the summary period. Used for personal use tracking and tax calculations where private vehicle use needs to be accounted for.

journeyBetweenSitesKms.description: Total distance in kilometers for journeys classified as 'Journey Between Sites' during the summary period. Used for inter-office or site-to-site travel tracking in business operations.

totalKms.description: Total combined distance in kilometers across all journey classifications during the summary period. Represents the complete distance traveled regardless of journey purpose or classification.

startDate.description: The start date and time for the period, in UTC, in the format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss

endDate.description: The end date and time for the period, in UTC, in the format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss. The endDate cannot be more than 7 days from the startDate.

vehicleId.description: Identifier of a vehicle. Must be specified if a value for groupId has not been specified.

groupId.description: Identifier of a group. Must be specified if a value for vehicleId has not been specified.

excludeChildGroups.description: Specifies if triggered alerts for vehicles in child groups should be excluded and not included in the response. This parameter can be used to overcome asset day limits being exceeded. If not specified, then will default to a false, so alerts for vehicles in child groups are included.

name.description: Name of the alert. This is a case insensitive partial match. An alert will match if the specified value is found anywhere in the alert name.

type.description: Type of alert - can be one of the following: arriveOnLeaveLocationAlert, cameraAlert, cameraEventAlert, driveTimeAlert, drivingWithoutAuthenticationKeyAlert, exceptionAlert, generalUserAlert, idlingAssetAlert, inputAlert, lateStartAlert, lowStartKeyAlert, lowEVChargeAlert, maintenanceFaultAlert, onTimeLastJobArrivalAlert, outOfHoursAlert, speedOverAlert, stopTimeAlert, tamperEventAlert.

subscriberEmail.description: Email address of alert subscriber. This is a case insensitive partial match. An alert will match if the specified value is found anywhere in the set of email recipients for an alert. Can be used to return all alerts sent to the specified email address.

subscriberTelephone.description: Telephone number of alert subscriber for SMS notifications.

subscriberWebUser.description: Identifier of a Connect user. Can be used to return all alerts sent to the specified Connect user.

pageSize.description: Specifies the number of items to include on a page. Must be specified if pageIndex has been specified. If not specified, then will default to a pageSize of 100.

pageIndex.description: Must be set with pageSize. Default for page index is 0.

startDate.description: The start date and time for the period, in UTC, in the format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss

endDate.description: The end date and time for the period, in UTC, in the format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss. The endDate cannot be more than 7 days from the startDate.

driverId.description: Identifier of a driver. Must be specified if a value for groupId has not been specified.

groupId.description: Identifier of a group. Must be specified if a value for driverId has not been specified.

excludeChildGroups.description: Specifies if triggered alerts for drivers in child groups should be excluded and not included in the response. This parameter can be used to overcome asset day limits being exceeded.

name.description: Name of the alert. This is a case insensitive partial match. An alert will match if the specified value is found anywhere in the alert name.

type.description: Type of alert - can be one of the following: arriveOrLeaveLocationAlert, cameraAlert, cameraEventAlert, driveTimeAlert, drivingWithoutAuthenticationKeyAlert, exceptionAlert, genericInputAlert, idlingAssetAlert, inputAlert, lateStartAlert, lowBatteryAlert, lowEVChargeAlert, maintenanceFaultAlert, onTimeLateJobArrivalAlert, outOfHoursAlert, speedOverXAlert, stopTimeAlert, tamperEventAlert.

subscriberEmail.description: Email address of alert subscriber. This is a case insensitive partial match. An alert will match if the specified value is found anywhere in the set of email recipients for an alert. Can be used to return all alerts sent to the specified email address.

subscriberTelephone.description: Telephone number of alert subscriber for SMS notifications.

subscriberWebUser.description: Identifier of a Connect user. Can be used to return all alerts sent to the specified Connect user.

pageSize.description: Specifies the number of items to include on a page. Must be specified if pageIndex has been specified. If not specified, then will default to a pageSize of 100.

pageIndex.description: Must be set with pageSize. Default for page index is 0.

id.description: System generated identifier (alphanumeric) of the alert.

customerId.description: The Connect identifier for the customer.

dateTime.description: Date and time of the alert was triggered, in UTC, in format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.

personId.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier (alphanumeric) for the driver of the vehicle.

message.description: The notification text for the alert.

subscribers.description: List of subscribers who received notification that the alert was triggered.

type.description: Type of alert - can be one of the following: arriveOrLeaveLocationAlert, cameraAlert, cameraEventAlert, driveTimeAlert, drivingWithoutAuthenticationKeyAlert, exceptionAlert, genericInputAlert, idlingAssetAlert, inputAlert, lateStartAlert, lowBatteryAlert, lowEVChargeAlert, maintenanceFaultAlert, onTimeLastJobArrivalAlert, outOfHoursAlert, speedOverXAlert, stopTimeAlert, tamperEventAlert.

totalTimeDrivenWithoutPtoSeconds.description: Total time in seconds that the vehicle was driving and where the PTO input was inactive

totalTimeStoppedSeconds.description: Total time in seconds that the vehicle was stopped, i.e. total time from the end of this journey to the start of the next journey. Will be zero if this is the last journey that matched the search parameters

idlingFidelity.description: The type of idling that can be detected on the vehicle. Values are: 0 = Idling is not supported, 1 = Idling is detected when the vehicle is stationary, 2 = Idling is detected when the vehicle is stationary and the engine is running

startElectricBatteryLevelPercent.description: The electric vehicle battery level as a percentage at the start of the journey

startElectricBatteryLevelPercentEstimate.description: Boolean (true/false) if the electric vehicle battery level was estimated - true if estimated, false if received from the vehicle

startElectricRangeKm.description: The range (in km) for the electric vehicle at the start of the journey

startElectricRangeKmEstimated.description: Boolean (true/false) if the range was estimated - true if estimated, false if received from the vehicle

endElectricBatteryLevelPercent.description: The electric vehicle battery level as a percentage at the end of the journey

endElectricBatteryLevelPercentEstimated.description: Boolean (true/false) if the electric vehicle battery level was estimated - true if estimated, false if received from the vehicle

endElectricRangeKm.description: The range (in km) for the electric vehicle at the end of the journey

endElectricRangeKmEstimated.description: Boolean (true/false) if the range was estimated - true if estimated, false if received from the vehicle

startFuelLevelPercentage.description: The fuel level as a percentage at the start of the journey. If fuel level is received then either startFuelLevelPercentage or startFuelLevelLitres will be returned

startFuelLevelLitres.description: The fuel level in litres at the start of the journey. If fuel level is received then either startFuelLevelPercentage or startFuelLevelLitres will be returned

endFuelLevelPercentage.description: The fuel level as a percentage at the end of the journey. If fuel level is received then either endFuelLevelPercentage or endFuelLevelLitres will be returned

endFuelLevelLitres.description: The fuel level in litres at the end of the journey. If fuel level is received then either endFuelLevelPercentage or endFuelLevelLitres will be returned

endEngineHours.description: Engine Hours at the end of the journey

electricUsedkWhEstimated.description: Boolean (true/false) if the electricity used was estimated - true if estimated, false if received from the vehicle

gasUsedKg.description: Gas for this journey in Kg

fuelUsedPetrolEquivalentLitres.description: The total energy (Electricity, Gas,Petrol, Diesel) used for this journey is expressed as the petrol equivalent in litres. Consumption as MPG or L/100km can derived as follows: Le/100km = (fuelUsedPetrolEquivalentLitres / distanceKm) * 100, MPGe = (distanceKm / 1.609) / (fuelUsedPetrolEquivalentLitres / 4.546)

CO2Kg.description: CO2 (in kg) for the total fuel/gas used for this journey

eventDateTime.description: Date/time when the event occurred, in UTC, in format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.ms.

eventType.description: Type of tracking event, such as Journey Start, Journey End, Tracking Point, etc.

coordinate.description: Geographic coordinates of the tracking event.

address.description: Formatted address of the tracking event location.

heading.description: Compass heading of the vehicle at the time of the tracking event, in degrees (0-359).

speed.description: Speed of the vehicle at the time of the tracking event, in km/h.

fuelLevel.description: Current fuel level as a percentage (0-100).

TrackingHistoryResultDto.description: Detailed tracking event information for vehicles and drivers

processedDateTime.description: Date/time that should be used as the fromDateTime parameter in subsequent calls to retrieve the next batch of tracking events, in UTC, in format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.ms.

totalCount.description: Total number of tracking events included in the response (maximum 500).

LatestTrackingHistoryResultsDto.description: Response containing the latest tracking events with pagination information

totalPages.description: Total number of pages based on the pageSize.

totalCount.description: Total number of input blocks that matched the search parameters.

WithPaginationResultInputUsageDto.description: Paginated response containing input usage results

vehicleName.description: The friendly name of the vehicle.

vehicleId.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier (alphanumeric) for the vehicle.

driverId.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier (alphanumeric) for the driver.

vehicleGroupName.description: Name of the group the vehicle has been assigned to.

vehicleGroupId.description: Identifier (alphanumeric) of the group the vehicle has been assigned to.

driverGroupName.description: Name of the group the driver has been assigned to.

driverGroupId.description: Identifier (alphanumeric) of the group assigned to the driver.

inputBlock.description: Details of the input usage block.

InputUsageDto.description: Input usage details for vehicles and drivers

eventStartDate.description: Input usage start date and time, in UTC in format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.

eventStartFormattedAddress.description: Input usage start address formatted as country specific comma separated set of values using roadNumber, road, city, postcode and country.

eventStartLocationName.description: Name of the input usage start POI location.

eventStartLocationGroupName.description: The name of the location category assigned to the input usage start POI location.

eventStartLocationId.description: The identifier (alphanumeric) for the input usage start POI location if the input was started when within the geo-fence boundary of a POI location.

eventStartLocationGroupId.description: The identifier (alphanumeric) of the location category assigned to the input usage start POI location.

eventEndDate.description: Input usage end date and time, in UTC in format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.

eventEndFormattedAddress.description: Input usage end address formatted as country specific comma separated set of values using roadNumber, road, city, postcode and country.

eventEndLocationName.description: Name of the input usage end POI location.

eventEndLocationGroupName.description: The name of the location category assigned to the input usage end POI location.

eventEndLocationId.description: The identifier (alphanumeric) for the input end POI location if the input usage ended within the geo-fence boundary of a POI location.

eventEndLocationGroupId.description: The identifier (alphanumeric) of the location category assigned to the input usage end POI location.

customLabel.description: The user defined custom Label for the input.

activeStateLabel.description: The label for input active state. For example for a toggle input this could be "On".

inactiveStateLabel.description: The label for input inactive state. For example for a toggle input this could be "Off".

customActiveStateLabel.description: The user defined custom Label for the input active state.

customInactiveStateLabel.description: The user defined custom Label for the input inactive state.

distanceKms.description: The distance (in Kms) that the vehicle travelled during the period that the input was used.

InputBlockDto.description: Details of input usage block with start/end location and usage metrics

totalPages.description: Total number of pages based on the pageSize.

totalCount.description: Total number of speeding episodes that matched the search parameters.

WithPaginationResultSpeedingDetailDto.description: Paginated response containing speeding episode results

startTime.description: Speeding episode start date and time, in UTC in format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss

maxSpeedTime.description: The date and time of the maximum speed in this speeding episode, in UTC in format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss

endTime.description: Speeding episode end date and time, in UTC in format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss

assetId.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier (alphanumeric) for the vehicle.

driverId.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier for the driver.

assetName.description: The friendly name of the vehicle.

startAddress.description: Address for the start location of the speeding episode, formatted as country specific comma separated set of values using roadNumber, road, city, postcode and country.

endAddress.description: Address for the end location of the speeding episode, formatted as country specific comma separated set of values using roadNumber, road, city, postcode and country.

duration.description: Duration in seconds for the speeding episode.

distanceKms.description: The distance (in Kms) that the vehicle travelled during the speeding episode.

groupName.description: Name of the group assigned to the vehicle.

averageSpeed.description: Average speed (in km/h) during the speeding episode.

maxSpeed.description: Maximum speed (in km/h) during the speeding episode.

maxPercentageOver.description: Percentage of maximum speed over the road speed limit for the vehicle type (assetSpeedLimitKph).

maxSpeedAddress.description: Address for the maximum speed location of the speeding episode, formatted as country specific comma separated set of values using roadNumber, road, city, postcode and country.

maxSpeedCoordinates.description: Coordinates for the location of maximum speed within this speeding episode.

startCoordinates.description: Coordinates for the start of the speeding episode.

endCoordinates.description: Coordinates for the end of the speeding episode.

speedingPointCount.description: The number of tracking frames received during the speeding episode.

assetSpeedLimitKph.description: The road speed limit for the vehicle type (in km/h).

maxSpeedDistanceKm.description: The distance (in Kms) that the vehicle had travelled when the vehicle reached maximum speed during the journey (not just this speeding episode).

startLocation.description: The POI location name if the speeding episode started within the geo-fence boundary of a POI location.

endLocation.description: The POI location name if the speeding episode ended within the geo-fence boundary of a POI location.

maxSpeedLocation.description: The POI location name if the maximum speed for the speeding episode started within the geo-fence boundary of a POI location.

startLocationId.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier (alphanumeric) for the speeding start POI location.

endLocationId.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier (alphanumeric) for the speeding end POI location.

maxSpeedLocationId.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier (alphanumeric) for the maximum speed start POI location.

SpeedingDetailDto.description: Detailed information about a speeding episode including location, timing, and speed metrics

totalPages.description: Total number of pages based on the pageSize.

totalCount.description: Total number of idling activity blocks that matched the search parameters.

items.description: Array of idling activity block details.

WithPaginationResultIdlingDetailDto.description: Paginated response containing idling activity block results

vehicleId.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier (alphanumeric) for the vehicle.

vehicleName.description: The friendly name of the vehicle.

driverId.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier (alphanumeric) for the driver which is either the default driver for the vehicle or the driver that signed in with a driver key.

groupId.description: System identifier (alphanumeric) of the group the vehicle has been assigned to.

groupName.description: Name of the group the vehicle has been assigned to.

startDate.description: Start date and time of the idling activity block, in UTC, in format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss

endDate.description: End date and time of the idling activity block, in UTC, in format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss

duration.description: Duration in seconds for the idling activity block.

coordinate.description: Longitude and latitude values for the idling activity block.

address.description: Formatted address for the idling activity block.

location.description: POI location information including locationId and locationName.

IdlingDetailDto.description: Detailed information about an idling activity block including location, timing, and duration

totalPages.description: Total number of pages based on the pageSize.

totalCount.description: Total number of behaviour metrics that matched the search parameters.

WithPaginationResultDrivingBehaviourSumm.description: Paginated response containing driver behaviour summary results

stops.description: Count of the number of stops.

ptoIdle.description: Total time idling with PTO active.

countOfSpeedingEpisodes.description: Count of the number of speeding episodes.

drivePlusIdleTime.description: Sum of idle and drive time.

smootherHarshPer100kms.description: Number of harsh events per 100 kms.

safeSpeedPercentage.description: Safe speed KPI as a percentage.

groupId.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier for the group.

totalCO2Kg.description: Total CO2 in Kg for the total fuel/gas used for all journeys in this period.

startDate.description: Summary start date and time, in UTC in format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.

endDate.description: Summary end date and time, in UTC in format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.

vehicleName.description: The friendly name of the vehicle.

vehicleId.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier for the vehicle.

energyType.description: The energy type for the vehicle. Can be one of the following: UNDEFINED, EV - Battery Electric Vehicle, PHEV - Plug-in Hybrid Electric Vehicle, HEV - Hybrid Electric Vehicle, FCEV - Fuel Cell Electric Vehicle (hydrogen), ICE - Internal combustion engine, CNG - Compressed Natural Gas, LNG - Liquefied natural gas, LPG - Liquefied petroleum gas, BI-FUEL - multi-fuel engines capable of running on two fuels.

fuelType.description: A list of the primary and secondary fuel types for the vehicle. Values in the list can included: PETROL, DIESEL, PROPANE, METHANE, ELECTRIC, HYDROGEN.

fuelUsedPetrolEquivalentLitres.description: The total energy (Electricity, Gas, Petrol, Diesel) used for all journeys expressed as the petrol equivalent in litres.

gasUsedKg.description: Gas for all journeys in Kg.

electricUsedKWh.description: Electricity used for all journeys in kWh.

fuelUsedLitres.description: Petrol or Diesel fuel used for all journeys, in litres.

totalPages.description: Total number of pages based on the pageSize.

totalCount.description: Total number of vehicles that matched the search parameters.

totalCount.description: Total number of drivers that matched the search parameters.

numberOfEngineOverRevvingEvents.description: Number of over revving events in the specified period.

numberOfSpeedingEvents.description: Number of speeding events in the specified period.

numberOfHarshAccelerationEvents.description: Number of harsh acceleration events in the specified period.

numberOfHarshBrakingEvents.description: Number of harsh braking events in the specified period.

numberOfHarshCorneringEvents.description: Number of harsh cornering events in the specified period.

numberOfExcessiveIdlingOutsideBaseEvents.description: Number of excessive idling events outside the base location specified period.

numberOfExcessiveIdlingInsideBaseEvents.description: Number of excessive idling events inside the base location specified period.

scoreForNumberOfEngineOverRevvingEvents.description: Score for the number of over revving events in the specified period.

scoreForNumberOfSpeedingEvents.description: Score for the number of speeding events in the specified period.

scoreForNumberOfHarshAccelerationEvents.description: Score for the number of harsh acceleration events in the specified period.

scoreForNumberOfHarshBrakingEvents.description: Score for the number of harsh braking events in the specified period.

scoreForNumberOfHarshCorneringEvents.description: Score for the number of harsh cornering events in the specified period.

scoreForNumberOfExcessiveIdlingOutsideBa.description: Score for the number of excessive idling events outside the base location specified period.

scoreForNumberOfExcessiveIdlingInsideBas.description: Score for the number of excessive idling events inside the base location specified period.

scorePerHour.description: Score per hour for this driver.

durationSeconds.description: Total duration of all journeys in the specified period.

groupName.description: Name of the group assigned to the driver.

groupId.description: Identifier (alphanumeric) of the group assigned to the driver.

groupRank.description: Positional rank of this driver in the group, with 1 being the highest rank.

entityInGroup.description: Number of drivers in this same group as this driver.

driverId.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier (alphanumeric) for the driver.

totalPages.description: Total number of pages based on the pageSize.

totalCount.description: Total number of events that matched the search parameters.

WithPaginationResultEcoScoreEventRespons.description: Paginated response for EcoScore driving events

vehicleName.description: The friendly name of the vehicle.

vehicleId.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier for the vehicle.

vehicleGroupName.description: Name of the group the vehicle has been assigned to.

vehicleGroupId.description: Identifier of the group the vehicle has been assigned to.

driverGroupName.description: Name of the group the driver has been assigned to.

driverGroupId.description: Identifier (alphanumeric) of the group the driver has been assigned to.

eventType.description: The vehicle score event type. Can be one of the following: behaviourHarshBraking, behaviourOverSpeed, behaviourExcessIdling, behaviourHarshAcceleration, behaviourHarshCornering, behaviourEngineOverReving.

eventDate.description: Date and time of the driving event, in UTC, YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.

eventDurationMs.description: Duration of the event in milliseconds.

speedKph.description: The speed of the vehicle (in Kph) when the incident occurred.

rateOfAcceleration.description: Included for a harsh acceleration event.

rateOfLateralAcceleration.description: Included for a harsh cornering event.

rateOfDeceleration.description: Included for a harsh braking event.

locationId.description: The identifier (alphanumeric) for the POI location if the event occurred within the geo-fence boundary of a POI location.

locationCategoryId.description: The identifier (alphanumeric) for the location category.

locationCategoryName.description: The name of the location category.

idlingFidelity.description: Included if the eventType is for excessive idling. The type of idling that can be detected on the vehicle. Values are: 0 = idling is not supported, 1 = idling is detected when the vehicle is stationary, 2 = idling is detected when the vehicle is stationary and the engine is running.

EcoScoreEventResponseDto.description: Comprehensive driving event data with vehicle, driver, location and event details
